job.title: Data Scientist - Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (100% Remote)
job.description: pWhat You Will DoppThis position supports performing the full systems and software architecture and life cycle for DevSecOps and full stack engineering tasks using Agile methodologies As an AI  ML Specialist you will be responsible to design implement and maintain data architectures and services to be used for AIML Candidate must be teamoriented selfstarting and innovationminded to individually and collectively contribute to the design and development of cuttingedge AI and Analytics solutionsppbrppJob DutiesppWork with functional analysts and product strategist to identify opportunities and leverage data to drive solutionsppAssess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniquesppDevelop custom data science models and algorithmsppWork with DevSecOps engineers to create and utilize MLOPS pipelineppActively seek and perform work new approaches and elevate the team to higher standardsppConduct various data wrangling tasks to ensure the highest possible data qualityppCommunicate complex tasks in plain English so others can comprehendppRecommend and implement solutions after analyzing business needs to drive for positive outcomesppFacilitate engineering tasks and push for completion of epicsppDevelop user stories and define clear and achievable acceptance criteriappConduct PRs to critique and encourage engineers to be their bestppCollaborate with other technical leads to handle crossteam dependenciesppbrppRequired SkillsppPassion  Demonstrated ability to keep pushing for better resultsppTechnology  Demonstrated experience using a variety of machine learning techniques and understanding of their realworld advantages and drawbacks Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts Experience with deploying models to production ideally within an AWS ecosystem Experience with Python R and Spark a plusppSystems  Demonstrated ability to proactively identify areas of technical improvement to improve efficiency performance scalability security and maintainability of applicationsppClient Management Ability to become clients trusted advisor and maximize their satisfactionppExpression Ability to communicate in plain English to disseminate information that others comprehendppSituation  Ability to understand external and internal factors and how they may impact program client and company and prepare mitigation approachesppStrategy  Ability to learn listen and plan programs and tasks for the betterment of organizationppTactical  Ability to implement strategy and deliver measurable business values in iterative incrementsppEntrepreneur  Ability to identify capture and implement opportunities tied to revenue streamsppEducation  Bachelors degree or higher in Computer Science Mathematics Engineering or related fieldppbrppDesired Skillspp5 years of experience implementing data science algorithmspp5 years of experience with AWSppLeadership experienceppExperience supporting sales and business developmentppExperience using SageMaker Databricks MLFlow or similar environmentppExperience with large scale high performance enterprise big data application deployment and solution architecture on complex heterogeneous environments in AWSppbrppstrongMust Be Eligible to Obtain Government ClearancestrongppstrongDue to federal client requirements only US Citizens can be consideredstrongp
